entry.title: Merge Update: Devs Advance Closer to Eth2 With Major Step Next Week

entry.title: NFT Fund Starry Night Goes Dark on SuperRare
entry.summary: Speculation is mounting that Starry Night Capital, an NFT fund backed by 3AC, may be looking to raise funds through a sale of its collection.

entry.title: USDC Issuer Circle Announces Euro-Backed Stablecoin ￼ Euro Coin Will be Available to Mint and Redeem on June 30
entry.summary: Circle, the issuer of USDC, will launch a new stablecoin pegged to the euro, the company announced Thursday.
